summary: An ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2064, for the improvement of Occidental Avenue, from Yesler Way to King Street, in the City of Seattle, by the installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line on each side of said avenue, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wires, as may be necessary, for the proper installation and equipment of said system, under Ordinance No. 20763 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
